title: Im bronze being placed with gold 4 to silver 1
body: im not sure if this is a bug but im getting destroyed each ranked so help :c

replies.body:
You are lv30, you have no business playing ranked. Not sure how you even got into it that early.

You are decidedly not bronze, though. Even most of the worst iron players are going to stomp a fresh new player. Come back later and you will have more luck. New players start with high silver MMR, it is up to them to sink or swim from there.
